The jail.startText: You are in jail and need to escape! What are you going to do?

2.text: A guard walks up and says "You suck! I thought you were an actual baby!"

Out side.startText: You made it! you're now out side! What now?

1.text: You jump and yell "Yas!" then a guard hears you and throws you back into jail

3.text: You wait for a bit and a guard walks by and sees you and puts you back into jail

Path.startText: You have been fallowing the path for some time now and are met with a fork in the road.

1.text: You go left path..... and end up in jail

2.text: You go right path..... and end up in jail

3.text: You use all of your power to jump and fly but your powers were not strong enough. And fall about 100ft and die!
